pilithura: “agra dewaduthaya” yana wachanaya bayibalaye pada dekaka pamanak dakiya hakiya. 1 thesalonika 4:16 prakasha karanawa “maknisada swamin wahansema mahath shabdayakda uththama dewaduthayekuge handada dewiyan wahansege horana nadayada athuwa swargayen basnaseka, kristhus wahanse thula malawu aya palamukota nagitinnoya.”

mathakayi neda api me chithra andinne pasal pawure pita paththe.ee kiyanne pewmant eke indagena..windhyage ammath ethana thiyapu putuwaka indagena apiwa balagena ehema innawa.ee aantith ehema sara kenek neweyi.ee nisa api pissu natuwata baninneth na.oya atharedi pare yana bas , thriwil wala ehema inna samaharu ka gahagena,wihilu karagenath yanawa.eeth wade kochchara jolida kiwwoth apita oya mokuth kisima prashnayak wage nam danune na...
